title: What would've happened to the MythBusters if their cannonball accident actually killed someone? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Mythbusters show had all manner of safety experts and insurance guys approving everything…. They alluded to this all the time during the shows. “The insurance people wouldn’t let us do this….” So, had there been a fatal accident of some sort, likely the insurance people would have descended like locusts on the survivors and reached a quick settlement…. And very likely a non-disclosure agreement.
